format: html

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
df <- read_csv("user_behavior_dataset.csv")
```

```{r}
num <- df |> select(where(is.numeric)) |> select(-`User ID`)
cat <- df |> select(where(is.character)) |>
  mutate(across(where(is.character), as.factor))
user_id <- df |> select(`User ID`)
```



```{r}
lapply(cat, table)
```

```{r}
lapply(names(cat), function(col_name) {
  ggplot(data = cat, aes(x = .data[[col_name]], fill = .data[[col_name]])) +
    labs(title = paste("Count of", col_name),
         x = col_name,
         y = "Count") +
    geom_bar()
  })
```

```{r}
for (i in names(cat)){
  for (j in names(cat)){
    if(i != j){
      result <- table(cat[[i]], cat[[j]])
      print(paste(i, "vs", j))
      print(result)
    }
  }
}
```
